TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopedCms extends System.Object

summary.span: 类表示封装数据的 CMS/PKCS #7 结构。

span.span: The class represents a CMS/PKCS #7 structure for enveloped data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密消息语法 RFC 的这些内容的类型来指定以下 MIME 类型和 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的文件扩展名。The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types. |内容类型Content type|MIME 类型MIME type|扩展名Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedDataenvelopedData|application/pkcs7-mimeapplication/pkcs7-mime|.p7m.p7m| |signedDatasignedData|application/pkcs7-signatureapplication/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c.p7s.p7c|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有以下默认属性值。The class has the following default property values. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 （数据） 长度： 零1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| ||1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC)1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC)| 默认值对于收件人是。The default for recipients is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] Encode() cil managed

summary.span: 方法对封装的 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内容进行编码并将其作为一个字节值数组返回。

span.span: The method encodes the contents of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message and returns it as an array of byte values.

summary.span: 必须在编码之前完成加密。

span.span: Encryption must be done before encoding.

returns.span: 如果此方法成功，则返回一个表示编码信息的字节值数组。

span.span: If the method succeeds, the method returns an array of byte values that represent the encoded information.

returns.span: 如果此方法失败，则会引发异常。

span.span: If the method fails, it throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或另一个必须在此方法之前调用方法。 or another method must be called before this method. 方法不会导致要填充的属性。The method does not cause the property to be populated.

exception.span: 一个方法调用对于对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

summary.span: 加密 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内容。

span.span: Encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Encrypt() cil managed

summary.span: 方法加密 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内容。

span.span: The method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会显示在其中选择要为其加密消息的收件人一个用户界面。This method displays a user interface in which you choose the recipients for whom to encrypt the message. 这要求当前进程是否正在*用户交互模式*，这意味着，属性设置为`true`。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. 进程在用户交互模式中处于正常情况下，除非它为服务进程或在 Web 应用程序内部运行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 用户界面将仅显示的证书，其有效期内以及具有密钥加密或密钥及其密钥用法中包含的协议。The user interface will only present certificates that are within their validity period and that have key encipherment or key agreement included in their key usage. 方法不会导致要填充的属性。The method does not cause the property to be populated. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 需要以下权限来显示用户界面：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: -

exception.span: 未能完成加密操作。

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Encrypt(class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection recipients) cil managed

param.name: recipients
param.span: 一个 集合，表示收件人列表的信息。

span.span: A collection that represents the information for the list of recipients.

summary.span: 方法通过使用指定的收件人列表的信息来加密 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内容。

span.span: The method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the information for the specified list of recipients.

summary.span: 使用通过对称加密算法（如三重 DES）生成的消息加密密钥来加密消息。

span.span: The message is encrypted by using a message encryption key with a symmetric encryption algorithm such as triple DES.

summary.span: 然后通过每个收件人的公钥对该消息加密密钥进行加密。

span.span: The message encryption key is then encrypted with the public key of each recipient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会导致要填充的属性。The method does not cause the property to be populated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecipientInfos As RecipientInfoCollection

summary.span: 属性检索与 CMS/PKCS #7 封装消息关联的收件人信息。

span.span: The property retrieves the recipient information associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 一个表示收件人信息的 集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the recipient information.

value.span: 如果不存在任何收件人，则该属性值为空集合。

span.span: If no recipients exist, the property value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是只读的虽然的修改中的对象可以通过使用其属性。Although this property is read-only, a modification to the objects in the can be done by using their properties. 因调用而不填充属性方法或任何重载 EnvelopedCms.Encrypt 方法。The property is not populated as a result of calling the method nor any of the overloaded EnvelopedCms.Encrypt methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnprotectedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 属性检索与 CMS/PKCS #7 封装消息关联的未保护（未加密）特性。

span.span: The property retrieves the unprotected (unencrypted) attributes associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: 未保护特性是未经加密的，因此 对象内没有数据保密性。

span.span: Unprotected attributes are not encrypted, and so do not have data confidentiality within an object.

value.span: 一个表示未保护特性的 集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the unprotected attributes.

value.span: 如果不存在任何未保护特性，则属性值为空集合。

span.span: If no unprotected attributes exist, the property value is an empty collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 属性检索 CMS/PKCS #7 封装消息的版本。

span.span: The property retrieves the version of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 一个表示 CMS/PKCS #7 封装消息的版本的整数值。

span.span: An int value that represents the version of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本确定消息是否是 PKCS #7 消息或加密消息语法 (CMS) 的消息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的较新超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
